data.actual_result: Scrolls back up to the top
data.expected_result: The position in the search box should be the same as before
data.short_description: Search goes back up to the top if you switch server and switch back
data.steps_to_repro: - Search for memes in the search box - Scroll down a bit - Switch to the more serious guild where memes are banned - Switch back to the meme guild
